text: [Music]
hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with grilled swordfish and cherry
tomato bruschetta I didn't plan on
filming this recipe but when I finished
it was so amazing I decided to at least
film the serving and then simply explain
what I did and hopefully you still will
be able to make this so kind of an
experiment alright so here's what
happened
I took some Italian bread brushed it
lightly with olive oil and grilled it
over charcoal until it looked like that
nicely toasted definite grilled char
marks that's what you want then I
grilled some swordfish steaks beautiful
piece of meat they're about an inch
thick I went about four minutes per side
just perfect all I had on there little
grape seed oil salt and pepper
that's it then to top I took some purple
cherry tomatoes I think they were a
variety of heirloom Cherokee Tomatoes I
cut them in half I tossed it with
balsamic vinegar olive oil salt pepper
and a big pinch of Thai basil regular
basil of course would work perfectly and
I tossed all that together and I let it
sit for about a half-hour getting all
beautiful on the countertop and all this
amazing tomato juice mixes with that oil
and that vinegar and it's just such a
perfect topping for this fish and bread
I mean as you look at that plate you can
almost see the sunshine radiating back
out of those cherry tomatoes like just
warming your soul was that was that too
much anyway a fresh tomato salad like
this obviously highlights the fish but
also those juices don't even get me
started on the juices look at them
running into that bread this was perfect
could not have been simpler and as you
can see here an unbelievably delicious
bite just summer on a fork right there
you go so like I said just a little bit
of an experiment can you share a recipe
without actually showing how you make it
and I think for something this simple
you can so anyway don't worry there's no
change in format here I just had this
footage of me serving the swordfish and
I wanted to share the recipe for
something that has like four ingredients
this is just a magical
a magical plate of food so anyway I hope
you give that a try go to food wishes
calm for way more information and as
always enjoy
